overview.title: Tooltip Component
overview.description: Tooltips display informative text when a user hovers over or focuses on an element.

js.title: JavaScript
js.description: JS is often used to control the positioning and visibility of tooltips.

best-practices.title: Best Practices
points: Tooltips should contain non-essential, supplementary information.

questions.question: Tooltips are typically triggered by which user action?
answers: Hovering the mouse over an element
